allTokens(address).notice: only returns a maximum of 256 tokens use offchain retrival services to obtain token information on owner!

getBalanceOfWallet(uint32).notice: gets the balance of a wallet associated with a tokenId

userdoc.notice: The purpose of this contract is to act as a service to provide data in a web3 or web2 context. You will find methods for data retrival here for previews, tokens, and stickers. and it is advised that you use get from here and not actual storage contract!
